Package net.fabbrication.graph

Interface Summary
GraphModelGenerator Graph Model Generators are classes which generate a graph and it's associated drawing.
 

Class Summary
Edge Simple representation of an edge in a graph.
Graph Undirected graph representation.
GraphApp Graphical application for manipulation and visualization of graphs.
GraphModel A graph and how it is currently drawn.
GraphView View and Controller class for graph drawing and editing pane.
SimpleTreeGenerator First example Graph Model Generator class.
SimpleTreeGenerator.Recipe  
Test Dummy class for throwing unit test code into.
TreeVertex VertexShape subclass which includes state useful for tree generation and drawing.
Vertex A vertex in the graph theory sense.
 

Exception Summary
GraphException Generic exception class for the graph package.
GraphModelGenerator.GMGException
